Uses of Interface
noppes.npcs.api.IPos

Packages that use IPos
Package
Description
noppes.npcs.api
 
noppes.npcs.api.block
 
noppes.npcs.api.entity
This package contains entity interfaces.
noppes.npcs.api.event
This package contains event classes whose instances are dispatched to the corresponding hook functions (if present) in CNPC scripts.
